trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There was one other sighting in San Francisco on or around November 12th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsA bright fast moving ORB flies 15 feet from me, just above my backyard fence then vanishes. It was not visible with the naked eye, only with IR. As this single bright round ORB moved near me, I could see it���s eye or center iris open up then close and then reopen again when I paused the video on playback. This is not something you see everyday, even with an IR camera. I felt an intelligence radiate from it as it was looking at me sitting next to my 8 UFO cameras looking up, my 8 VCRs and monitors. This ORB visit was a little close for comfort but I love the adventure and whatever risk I am taking. Can this ORB be something other than an alien remote camera, probe or eye? Can it be from a spiritual dimension (maybe energy of a dead relative or pet saying hello to me). I do not have an answer, only the video footage. What does it mean to you?
Summary: Caught Orb looking at me with IR camera
